Reviews.Title: Camera  functions but software is useless
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Had to go to internet for a usable software.All text in original was badly written and partially unreadable.  I contacted maker on internet and was told software would not work on windows 7.  I was told they would soon have new software-all I have to do is wait until they find someone who writes english.

Reviews.Title: very confusing and hard to set up.
Reviews.Author: emiliana
Reviews.Content: it works but the set up was hard and took awhile to figure out. i cant access it via my phone unless its connected via wifi at my house.

ProductInfo.Features:
This ip camera FS-613A-M136 Wireless IP Camera features 0.3 megapixel resolution (640 x 480), 3.6mm CMOS lens with 67 degree viewing angle, IR LEDs for upto 10 meter night vision as well as full remote control and recording capabilities
The camera performs well as a family/baby monitor or as part of a complete office or home surveillance system with remote internet monitoring and control
Cameras come with a program called Integrated Surveillance Center which allows you to connect to up to 64 cameras and record them to your harddrive in AVI format
The video files are compressed using MPEG4 Compression
t is also smartphone compatible (Iphone & Android), viewable over the internet or local network using the standard browswers (Internet Explorer, Safari, Google Chrome and Firefox)
ProductInfo.Name: EasyN F-M136 300,000 Pixels Wireless WIFI IP Security Camera Webcam Surveillance System, 2-Audio 10 LED 10m IR Nightvision, Cartoon Robot Shape
